messages.content: Set the Den Lamp ramp rate to 1.0 minute and then turn it off quickly.
Please rediscover the Sonos Controller and then beep the Den Lamp with the beep code 100.
Turn on the lamp in the den and the bar lamps in the LR Mini A.

__BEGIN_NUCORE_COMMAND__
{
  "device_id": "18 95 5E 1",
  "command_id": "DON",
  "reasoning": "User wants to turn on the Den Lamp, so use DON command."
}
__END_NUCORE_COMMAND__
__BEGIN_NUCORE_COMMAND__
{
  "device_id": "34 FE BA 1",
  "command_id": "DON",
  "reasoning": "User wants to turn on the LR-Mini-A-Bar Lamps, so use DON command."
}
__END_NUCORE_COMMAND__
Dim the Den Lamp to 40% and set its backlight to 60%.
